text: Spindrift is a soda and seltzer company that was founded in 2010 by Bill Creelman. Spindrift's marketing emphasizes that there is 5-8% real fruit juice in every can of its sparkling water, as opposed to the "natural flavors" used by competitors. Spindrift has 98 employees and $40.20 m in total funding. ==Flavors== Spindrift is currently available in 11 flavors: grapefruit, blackberry, cucumber, lemon, raspberry lime, orange mango, strawberry, cranberry raspberry, lime, pineapple, and half and half (half lemon, half tea). ==References== Category:Food and drink companies established in 2010 Category:American companies established in 2010 Category:Drink companies of the United States
